Html: Looks like a great tool, but the identifier needs to be consistent - is it Chirpy or is it Zippy?

Chirpy is its name. Zippy is its game.

Initially, the project was named "Zippy Chirpy".

Then, the project name was shortened to "Chirpy".

Now, any references to "Zippy" are passe.

In the next release, all the "Zippy" references should no longer be visible.
Just an FYI: this issue should be resolved in the newest release. Chirpy is Chirpy, and that is all. :)
